item.description:
"Another Part of the Forest" by Lillian Hellman
Time: 7:30 p.m.
Meet inside the entrance to the theater at 7:30 p.m. The organizer for this event, Ron Correia, will be wearing a black button-down shirt. The show starts at 8 p.m.

There is no reserve seating in the theater, so please be on time so everyone can sit together!

Price: $25.00
Note: Ron is reserving tickets in advance, so please RSVP and then reimburse Ron when you get to the theater, since he is incurring the costs. Ron will contact you with his cell phone when you RSVP. Tickets are non-refundable, so if you do RSVP, please show up!

Get directions. Note: There is a large parking lot next to the theater.
Access to the parking lot is on Route 114 in Warren. There is
a large "2nd Story Theater" sign on Route 114.

Contact: Ron Correia
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the entrance. Ron will be wearing a black button-down shirt.
item.name: "Another Part of the Forest" -- Warren
